headline: Technovation 2024 Highlights PMI's Progress Toward Smoke-Free Future
summary: With just five years remaining until Philip Morris International's 2030 smoke-free target, aiming for over two-thirds of the company's revenue to come from smoke-free products, PMI is optimistic...
